snippet: The acclaimed New York restaurant Le Cirque (lecirque.com) is taking its lobster salad and other recipes on the road in a series of pop-up dinners across the country.
abstract: The acclaimed New York restaurant Le Cirque (lecirque.com) is taking its lobster salad and other recipes on the road in a series of pop-up dinners across the country.

headline.main: Le Cirque to Pop Up With Dinner on the Road
